name: European Union Chamber of Commerce in China
membership: Member of the European Business Organisation (EBO) Worldwide Network
goal: As the independent voice of European business in China, we seek greater market access and improved operating conditions for European companies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade, Investment, EU-China Comprehensive Agreement on Investment, Trade Defense Instruments, Overcapacity
